mapper.sql: ehjsb.ht_jig_standing_book_id, ehjsb.jig_standing_book_id, ehjsb.jig_barcode_id, ehjsb.property_code_category, ehjsb.release_date, ehjsb.dept_id, ehjsb.depreciable_life, ehjsb.`status`, ehjsb.remark, ehjsb.org_id, ehjsb.create_user_id, ehjsb.create_time, ehjsb.modified_time, ehjsb.modified_user_id, ehjsb.option1, ehjsb.option2, ehjsb.option3
mapper.select:
select , ejb.asset_code,ejb.usage_status,ej.jig_code,ej.jig_name,ej.jig_desc,ej.jig_model,ejc.jig_category_name, u.user_name as create_user_name, s.user_name as modified_user_name, bd.dept_name, bo.organization_name from eam_ht_jig_standing_book ehjsb left join eam_jig_barcode ejb on ehjsb.jig_barcode_id=ejb.jig_barcode_id left join eam_jig ej on ejb.jig_id=ej.jig_id left join eam_jig_category ejc on ej.jig_category_id=ejc.jig_category_id left join sys_user u on ehjsb.create_user_id=u.user_id left join sys_user s on ehjsb.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join base_dept bd on ehjsb.dept_id=bd.dept_id left join base_organization bo ON ehjsb.org_id = bo.organization_id
and ejb.asset_code like CONCAT('%', #{assetCode}, '%')
and ej.jig_code like CONCAT('%', #{jigCode}, '%')
and ej.jig_name like CONCAT('%', #{jigName}, '%')
and ehjsb.jig_barcode_id like CONCAT('%', #{jigBarcodeId}, '%')
and ehjsb.property_code_category like CONCAT('%', #{propertyCodeCategory}, '%')
and ehjsb.release_date like CONCAT('%', #{releaseDate}, '%')
and ehjsb.dept_id like CONCAT('%', #{deptId}, '%')
and date_format(ehjsb.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and ehjsb.status = #{status}
and ehjsb.org_id=#{orgId}
order by ehjsb.create_time desc
